00041 //----------------------------------------------------------
00042 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::GrPolygonBSPPortalSet( GrPolygonBSPSplit* split, float scale )
00043 : _creator( split )
00044 , _plane( split->GetPlane() )
00045 , _owner( 0 )
00046 , _hullPortal( 0 )
00047 , _hullDirty( true )
00048 #ifdef _CACHE_CULL_PLANES
00049 , _lastFromPortal( 0 )
00050 #endif
00051 {
00052         B_ASSERT( split != 0 );
00053 
00054         GrPortal::VertexArray polygon;
00055         CreatePlanePolygon( polygon, split->GetPlane(), scale );
00056         _portals.Push( GrPortal( split->GetPlane(), polygon ) );
00057 }

00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 bool
00072 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::Subtract( const GrPolygon& polygon, float epsilon )
00073 {
00074         B_ASSERT( _creator != 0 );
00075 
00077         _hullDirty = true;
00078 
00082         //
00090 
00092         int invert = 0;
00093         UFastArray< MPlane > planeArray;
00094         const unsigned int polygonVertexCount = polygon.GetVertexCount();
00095         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polygonVertexCount; ++i )
00096         {
00098                 unsigned int curVert = i;
00099                 unsigned int nextVert = ( i + 1 ) % polygonVertexCount;
00100 
00102                 MVec3 curPos = polygon.GetVertex( curVert ).position;
00103                 MVec3 nextPos = polygon.GetVertex( nextVert ).position;
00104                 MVec3 curEdge = nextPos - curPos;
00105 
00107                 MVec3 planeNormal = polygon.GetNormal().Cross( curEdge );
00108 
00110                 if ( planeNormal.MagSqr() < 0.001f )
00111                         continue;
00112 
00114                 if ( invert == 0 )
00115                 {
00116                         invert = 1;
00117                         MPlane testPlane( planeNormal, curPos );
00118                         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < polygonVertexCount; ++j )
00119                         {
00120                                 if ( testPlane.GetSide( polygon.GetVertex( j ).position, epsilon ) < 0 )
00121                                 {
00122                                         planeNormal = -planeNormal;
00123                                         invert = -1;
00124                                         break;
00125                                 }
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128                 else if ( invert == -1 )
00129                         planeNormal = -planeNormal;
00130 
00132                 planeNormal.Normalize();
00133 
00135                 planeArray.Push( MPlane( planeNormal, curPos ) );
00136         }
00137 
00139         const unsigned int curPlaneCount = planeArray.GetElemCount();
00140         if ( curPlaneCount < 3 )
00141                 return ( _portals.GetElemCount() > 0 );
00142 
00143         GrPortal frontPortal;
00144         GrPortal backPortal;
00145         const unsigned int portalCount = _portals.GetElemCount();
00146         for ( int i = portalCount-1; i >= 0; --i )
00147         {
00148                 GrPortal curPortal = _portals[ i ];
00149                 _portals.Erase( i );
00150 
00153                 bool skip = false;
00154                 const unsigned int curPortalVertexCount = curPortal.GetVertexCount();
00155                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < curPlaneCount; ++j )
00156                 {
00159                         unsigned int k = 0;
00160                         for ( ; k < curPortalVertexCount; ++k )
00161                         {
00162                                 if ( planeArray[ j ].GetSide( curPortal.GetVertex( k ), epsilon ) > 0 )
00163                                         break;
00164                         }
00165                         if ( k == curPortalVertexCount )
00166                         {
00167                                 skip = true;
00168                                 break;
00169                         }
00170                 }
00171 
00173                 if ( skip )
00174                 {
00175                         _portals.Push( curPortal );
00176                         continue;
00177                 }
00178 
00182                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < curPlaneCount; ++j )
00183                 {
00185                         int ret = curPortal.Split( frontPortal, backPortal, planeArray[ j ], _plane, epsilon );
00186                         if ( ret <= 0 && !backPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00187                                 _portals.Push( backPortal );    
00188                         if ( ret >= 0 && !frontPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00189                                 curPortal = frontPortal;                
00190 
00192                         if ( ret == -1 || frontPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00193                                 break;
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 
00198         return ( _portals.GetElemCount() > 0 );
00199 }

00201 //----------------------------------------------------------
00202 int
00203 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::Split( GrPolygonBSPPortalSet& front, GrPolygonBSPPortalSet& back, const MPlane& plane, float epsilon ) const
00204 {
00206         front._portals.Clear();
00207         front._creator = _creator;
00208         front._plane = _plane;
00209         back._portals.Clear();
00210         back._creator = _creator;
00211         back._plane = _plane;
00212 
00214         const unsigned int polygonCount = _portals.GetElemCount();
00215         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polygonCount; ++i )
00216         {
00218                 const GrPortal& curPortal = _portals[ i ];
00219 
00221                 GrPortal frontPortal;
00222                 GrPortal backPortal;
00223                 int ret = curPortal.Split( frontPortal, backPortal, plane, _plane, epsilon );
00224 
00226                 if ( ret >= 0 && !frontPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00227                 {
00228                         B_ASSERT( frontPortal.GetVertexCount() > 0 );
00229                         front._portals.Push( frontPortal );
00230                 }
00231                 if ( ret <= 0 && !backPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00232                 {
00233                         B_ASSERT( backPortal.GetVertexCount() > 0 );
00234                         back._portals.Push( backPortal );
00235                 }
00236         }
00237 
00240         int ret = 0;
00241         if ( front._portals.GetElemCount() != 0 )
00242                 ret += 1;
00243         if ( back._portals.GetElemCount() != 0 )
00244                 ret -= 1;
00245 
00247         return ret;
00248 }

00251 void
00252 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::ReverseWinding()
00253 {
00255         const unsigned int portalCount = _portals.GetElemCount();
00256         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < portalCount; ++i )
00257                 _portals[ i ].ReverseWinding();
00258 
00260         _plane.ReverseFacing();
00261 
00262         if ( _hullPortal )
00263                 _hullPortal->ReverseWinding();
00264 }

00282 void
00283 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::GenCullPlaneSet( std::vector< MPlane >& cullPlanes, const GrPortal& fromPortal, unsigned int toPortalIdx, bool best, bool cache ) const
00284 {
00286 #ifdef _CACHE_CULL_PLANES
00287         if ( cache )
00288         {
00289                 if ( _lastFromPortal == &fromPortal )
00290                 {
00291                         PlaneMap::const_iterator iter = _cullPlaneCache.find( toPortalIdx );
00292                         if ( iter != _cullPlaneCache.end() )
00293                         {
00294                                 cullPlanes.insert( cullPlanes.end(), iter->second.begin(), iter->second.end() );
00295                                 return;
00296                         }
00297                 }
00298                 else
00299                 {
00300                         _lastFromPortal = &fromPortal;
00301                         _cullPlaneCache.clear();
00302                 }
00303         }
00304 #endif
00305 
00308         GrPortal toPortal = GetPortal( toPortalIdx );
00309         const MPlane& toPortalPlane = GetPlane();
00310 
00311 #ifdef _CACHE_CULL_PLANES
00312         std::vector< MPlane >* planeCache;
00313         if ( cache )
00314                 planeCache = &_cullPlaneCache[ toPortalIdx ];
00315 #endif
00316 
00319         unsigned int fromPortalVertexCount = fromPortal.GetVertexCount();
00320         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < fromPortalVertexCount; ++i )
00321         {
00322                 int side = toPortalPlane.GetSide( fromPortal.GetVertex( i ), 0.01f );
00323                 if ( side < 0 )
00324                 {
00325                         toPortal.ReverseWinding();
00326                         break;
00327                 }
00328                 else if ( side > 0 )
00329                         break;
00330         }
00331 
00333         unsigned int toPortalVertexCount = toPortal.GetVertexCount();
00334         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < toPortalVertexCount; ++i )
00335         {
00337                 float bestDP = best ? -1000.0f : 1000.0f;
00338                 MVec3 bestNormal;
00339 
00341                 const MVec3& v0 = toPortal.GetVertex( i );
00342                 const MVec3& v1 = toPortal.GetVertex( ( i + 1 ) % toPortalVertexCount );
00343 
00346                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < fromPortalVertexCount; ++j )
00347                 {
00349                         MVec3 normal = ( fromPortal.GetVertex( j ) - v0 ).Cross( v1 - v0 );
00350                         if ( normal.MagSqr() < 0.0001f )
00351                                 continue;
00352 
00355                         normal.Normalize();
00356                         float curDP = normal.Dot( toPortalPlane.GetNormal() );
00357                         if ( best )
00358                         {
00359                                 if ( curDP > bestDP )
00360                                 {
00361                                         bestDP = curDP;
00362                                         bestNormal = normal;
00363                                 }
00364                         }
00365                         else
00366                         {
00367                                 if ( curDP < bestDP )
00368                                 {
00369                                         bestDP = curDP;
00370                                         bestNormal = normal;
00371                                 }
00372                         }
00373                 }
00374 
00378                 if ( best )
00379                 {
00380                         if ( bestDP > -1000.0f )
00381                         {
00384                                 MPlane bestPlane( bestNormal, v0 );
00385                                 cullPlanes.push_back( bestPlane );
00386 #ifdef _CACHE_CULL_PLANES
00387                                 if ( cache )
00388                                         planeCache->push_back( bestPlane );
00389 #endif
00390                         }
00391                 }
00392                 else
00393                 {
00394                         if ( bestDP < 1000.0f )
00395                         {
00398                                 MPlane bestPlane( bestNormal, v0 );
00399                                 cullPlanes.push_back( bestPlane );
00400 #ifdef _CACHE_CULL_PLANES
00401                                 if ( cache )
00402                                         planeCache->push_back( bestPlane );
00403 #endif
00404                         }
00405                 }
00406         }
00407 }

00462 //----------------------------------------------------------
00463 GrMeshInst*
00464 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::GenMesh( URef< GrMaterial > material )
00465 {
00467         if ( _portals.GetElemCount() == 0 )
00468                 return 0;
00469 
00471         GrPolygonGroup group;
00472         unsigned int polygonCount = _portals.GetElemCount();
00473         unsigned int polyIdx = 0;
00474         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polygonCount; ++i )
00475         {
00476                 GrPortal& curPortal = _portals[ i ];
00477                 if ( !curPortal.IsDegenerate() )
00478                 {
00480                         GrPolygon polygon;
00481                         const unsigned int polygonVertexCount = curPortal.GetVertexCount();
00482                         SPolygonVertex* vertices = new SPolygonVertex[ polygonVertexCount ];
00483                         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < polygonVertexCount; ++j )
00484                                 vertices[ j ].position = curPortal.GetVertex( j );
00485 
00487                         polygon.SetVertices( 0, vertices, polygonVertexCount, material );
00488                         group.AddPolygon( polygon );
00489 
00491                         delete vertices;
00492 
00494                         ++polyIdx;
00495                 }
00496         }
00497 
00499         if ( group.GetPolygonCount() == 0 )
00500                 return 0;
00501 
00504         group.GenPlanarUVMap( _plane );
00505         group.GenFaceNormals();
00506         group.GenTSBasis();
00507 
00509         std::vector< GrMeshInst* > meshes;
00510         group.GenMeshes( meshes, "Portal debug mesh", false, false );
00511 
00513         B_ASSERT( meshes.size() == 1 );
00514 
00516         return meshes[ 0 ];
00517 }

00550 //----------------------------------------------------------
00551 void
00552 GrPolygonBSPPortalSet::CreatePlanePolygon( GrPortal::VertexArray& polygon, const MPlane& plane, float scale )
00553 {
00554         const MVec3 kUp( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );
00555         const MVec3 kForward( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
00556 
00558         const MVec3& normal = plane.GetNormal();
00559         MVec3 point = -plane.GetD() * normal;
00560 
00562         bool facingUpOrDown = ( Abs( kUp.Dot( plane.GetNormal() ) ) > 0.9f );
00563 
00565         MVec3 right;
00566         if ( facingUpOrDown )
00567                 right = kForward.Cross( plane.GetNormal() ).Normalized();
00568         else
00569                 right = kUp.Cross( plane.GetNormal() ).Normalized();
00570 
00572         MVec3 up = right.Cross( plane.GetNormal() );
00573 
00575         right *= scale;
00576         up *= scale;
00577 
00579         MVec3 verts[ 4 ];
00580         polygon.Push( point + up - right );
00581         polygon.Push( point + up + right );
00582         polygon.Push( point - up + right );
00583         polygon.Push( point - up - right );
00584 //      MVec3 topLeft = point + up - right;
00585 //      MVec3 topRight = point + up + right;
00586 //      MVec3 bottomRight = point - up + right;
00587 //      MVec3 bottomLeft = point - up - right;
00588 
00590 //      polygon = GrPolygon( 0, verts, 4, 0 );
00591 
00595 #ifdef _DEBUG
00596         const unsigned int polygonVertexCount = polygon.GetElemCount();
00597         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polygonVertexCount; ++i )
00598         {
00599                 float absDist = Abs( plane.Dist( polygon[ i ] ) );
00600 //              B_ASSERT( plane.GetNormal().Dot( polygon.GetPlane().GetNormal() ) > 0.95f );
00601 //              B_ASSERT( absDist < 1.0f );
00602         }
00603 #endif
00604 }
